instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 Goes Fan Full Blast When Sleeping
threads.message: Got this board with really strange issue. It runs normally, works everything, except when I put it to sleep. When the machine enters sleep state fan goes full blast and stays like that until I wake it up. When machine wakes, everything goes back to normal, fan goes back to normal RPM and system works normally as expected. Already tried replacing battery sensor, battery itself, HDD cable and disconnected webcam. Board does the same on another case. Tried ASD OS and no problems found on sensors. Replaced SMC, same issue, flashed BIOS with clean ME, same results. Board has no corrosion at all, looks really clean. Any ideas?

threads.title: 820-3115 Goes Fan Full Blast When Sleeping
820-3115 Goes Fan Full Blast When Sleeping
threads.message: Headshot haha. Problem solved! Thanks again. For what I understood, this mosfet commutes between S0 and S3 state right?

threads.title: 820-3115 Goes Fan Full Blast When Sleeping
threads.message: Yes; S0 voltage must be off in sleep mode.
